questions.question: How pronounced is the citrus flavor in this beer?
questions.description: Citrus flavors often include notes of orange, lemon, grapefruit, or lime, providing a zesty and refreshing profile.

questions.question: To what extent do you taste tropical fruit in this beer?
questions.description: Tropical fruit flavors can encompass mango, pineapple, papaya, and passion fruit, contributing a juicy and exotic element.

questions.question: Rate the presence of stone fruit flavors in this beer.
questions.description: Stone fruit flavors include peach, apricot, and plum, imparting a slightly sweet and ripe character.

questions.question: How evident are berry notes in this beer's taste?
questions.description: Berry flavors involve hints of raspberry, blackberry, or blueberry, offering a touch of sweetness and tartness.

questions.question: How strong are the floral undertones in this beer?
questions.description: Floral notes resemble the scents of flowers, such as jasmine or rose, contributing a delicate and aromatic quality.

questions.question: Evaluate the grassy aspect of this beer's flavor.
questions.description: Grassy flavors evoke the taste of fresh-cut grass, often linked with herbal and earthy characteristics.

questions.question: Rate the herbal qualities in this beer's taste.
questions.description: Herbal flavors can remind you of mint, basil, or other culinary herbs, offering a unique and savory dimension.

questions.question: How prominent are the spice elements in this beer?
questions.description: Spice flavors involve a range of spices, such as cinnamon, clove, or black pepper, adding warmth and complexity.

questions.question: To what degree do you detect resinous or pine like notes in this beer?
questions.description: Resin flavors can resemble the resin of pine trees, lending a slightly resinous, earthy, and bitter characteristic.
